title: Wheel Bearings - Inspection

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Position the motorcycle on level ground, raise and support the front or rear of the motorcycle until the wheel is off the ground.
Hold the wheel at the top and bottom and rock the wheel checking for movement when a force is applied.
Check the wheel bearings spin smoothly with no signs of play.
If the bearings do not spin smoothly or there is excessive play in the wheel bearings, replace all bearings in that wheel.
